definition: to sit astride/to ride (a horse, bike etc)/classifier for saddle horses
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]

sentences.english: It is a wonderful experience to travel through the desert by camel.
sentences.chinese: 騎坐駱駝穿越沙漠旅行是一次了不起的體驗。

sentences.english: This is due to the fact that riders ride sitting up, because of the handlebar height.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲事實車手騎坐起來，因爲車把的高度。

sentences.english: The contact should be independent from the athlete's seat.
sentences.chinese: 手與口銜的接觸應該要獨立於騎手的騎坐之外。

sentences.english: This way, your seat and rein aids will be quite powerful.
sentences.chinese: 騎坐和繮聯繫將會十分有力。
